function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unauthorized access to sensitive data from G1 to G8","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to improper handling of sensitive health information","Mitigation":"Implement strict access control and encryption measures for sensitive health data","Technologies":"Data encryption, access control systems","People":"Patients, healthcare providers","Owner":"IT security team"},{"Description":"Misinterpretation of G1 to G8 data leading to incorrect diagnosis","Impact":"Misdiagnosis and improper treatment of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Provide training on data interpretation and implement automated error-checking systems","Technologies":"Training programs, error-checking algorithms","People":"Healthcare providers, patients","Owner":"Healthcare administrators"}]}
